WorkItem.Description:
In the stats section when you have either kings or mongoose selected you can get a multiple decimal point agility number such as 182.3124.
In the case of mongoose I'm not sure that the buff should show in the stats section (using it in the calc for agility is a given, for mitigation I'm divided, it's not something you can count on for mitigation really) in the case of kings it should be floored before shown.

Comments.Message: How's it look now? No change to how Mongoose is counted, just floored the buff from multipliers (kings).
The bug in this is fixed, the mongoose thing could be a discussion.

The proc from mongoose is listed under temp buffs. If you don't want it to show up, uncheck that box. I have 3 options, 1) turn the full mongoose proc (120 agi and haste) on, 2) turn the average value on taking into account weapon speed and hit/expertise values, 3) turn both off to simulate not having the buff at all.
